last_episode_to_air.name: The World's Biggest Family
last_episode_to_air.overview: Subrata Roy takes his Sahara India Pariwar conglomerate to dizzying heights before facing accusations of enticing poor investors into a pyramid scheme.

name: Bad Boy Billionaires: India
overview: This investigative docuseries explores the greed, fraud, and corruption that built up - and ultimately brought down - India's most infamous tycoons.

episodes.name: The King of Good Times
episodes.overview: Beer baron and airline owner Vijay Mallya builds a brand image of excess till his Kingfisher empire plunges into alleged money laundering and debt.
